title: Musician: Bell Ringer From Wedding Procession
description: musician: bell ringer from wedding procession; three color glazed ceramic; one set of 33 pieces, including wedding party, palanquin, wedding chests, ceremonial food and wedding party
creditline: Gift of funds from Mr. and Mrs. Charles Cleveland, Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr., and The John R. Van Derlip Fund
